projectDesc.p: Encoding as a primary source, especially for language.

correction.p: Corrections to errors observed in the text are given within choice elements alongside their original forms.

normalization.p: Ligatures are silently ignored. Long s (ſ) is transcribed.

hyphenation.p: End of line hyphenation has been retained when present, but it has variable usage throughout the text. Representation used is en dash.

segmentation.p: Structure of the Arte has been broken down according to a five-tiered outline . Further divison occurs based on principles of FLEX .

refsDecl.p: References for divs start with the word 'arte' followed by the section id. When there is a zapotec term, its id starts with the section id, which is followed by an underscore and then the number of the zapotec block that has been identified for analysis by the linguist

QVeria Gonçalo caſarſe casarse cõ con doña Vrraca. Y pri

quatro cuatro en quatro cuatro ſobrauan algunos todos erã hijos
o hijas, y aſsi así las contauan de diuerſas maneras ha-
ſta cinco vezes veces, y no ſobrãdo algunas era malo y no
ſe caſauan porque dizque no auiã de tener hijos por
que toda ſu su pretenſion en los caſamientos eran los
hijos. Ytem ſi si no ſobraua alguna haſta hasta la vltima ultima vez
era ſeñal señal que haſta hasta la vejez no auian habían de tener hijos.
